site_title: SST Origami Plane by James M. Sakoda

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 18 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. SST Origami Plane by James M. Sakoda. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. It is also the winner of the first international paper airplane contest in 1967. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 017 : Jumping Jack by Andrew Dewar", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/1LrKfI3oVfs Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Thanks for watching.

block_list.title: More Designs from Dr. James M. Sakoda
block_list.body:

  • SST Origami Plane by James M. Sakoda
